entry.value: library(tidyr)%%00010library(dplyr)%%00010library(gridExtra)%%00010library(ggplot2)%%00010%%00010df <- knime.in%%00010%%00010grouping_cols <- c(knime.flow.in[["group_column"]], knime.flow.in[["split_column"]])%%00010df_filtered <- df[,!(colnames(df) %in% grouping_cols)]%%00010%%00010if(!is.data.frame(df_filtered)) {%%00010%%00009df_filtered <- as.data.frame(df_filtered)%%00010%%00009colnames(df_filtered) <- colnames(df)[!(colnames(df) %in% grouping_cols)]%%00010}%%00010%%00010df_filtered <- cbind(df_filtered, histone = as.character(df[,knime.flow.in[["group_column"]]]))%%00010df_filtered <- cbind(df_filtered, old_modif = as.character(df[,knime.flow.in[["split_column"]]]))%%00010%%00010df_long <- df_filtered |>%%00010%%00009mutate(modif = ifelse(old_modif == 'V1', histone, old_modif)) |>%%00010%%00009select(-old_modif) |>%%00010%%00009gather(-histone, -modif, key = 'sample', value = 'intensity')%%00010%%00010df_long <- df_long |>%%00010%%00009group_by(sample, histone, modif)%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00010df_sum <- df_long |>%%00010%%00009summarize(summary = sum(intensity, na.rm = TRUE)) |>%%00010%%00009ungroup() |>%%00010%%00009as.data.frame() |>%%00010%%00009mutate(label = round(summary, digits = 3))%%00010%%00010p <- df_sum |>%%00010%%00009ggplot(aes(x = modif, y = summary, fill = sample)) +%%00010%%00009scale_fill_discrete(name = '') +%%00010%%00009geom_col(position = position_dodge()) +%%00010%%00009labs(x = 'Modification', y = 'Area') +%%00010%%00009theme_bw() +%%00010%%00009facet_wrap(.~histone, scales = 'free') +%%00010%%00009theme(axis.text.x.bottom = element_text(angle = knime.flow.in[["angle"]], hjust = knime.flow.in[["hjust"]]),%%00010%%00009%%00009 strip.background = element_blank(),%%00010%%00009%%00009 strip.text = element_text(size = 12))%%00010%%00010if(knime.flow.in[["graph_title"]] != '') p <- p + labs(title = knime.flow.in[["graph_title"]]) + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))%%00010%%00010if(knime.flow.in[["show_perc"]] == 1) p <- p + geom_text(aes(label = label, group = sample), position = position_dodge(width = 0.9), vjust = -0.5)%%00010%%00010p

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
